programs.title: Ang Dating Daan (Mandarin)
programs.description: Ang Dating Daan in Mandarin features Bro. Eli Soriano’s Itanong Mo Kay Soriano (Ask Soriano) program, only that the content is translated in Chinese Mandarin. By reading the Bible for answers, Bro. Eli Soriano engages viewers with an authoritative and scholarly study of topics that range from politics, society, health, science and religion. When a subject matter or topic is raised, Bro. Eli makes sure his response to the question is comprehensive and undeniable, making use of verses, contexts and historical relevance of the main characters, situations and commandments of God in the Bible. Bro. Eli, who is currently abroad for a worldwide evangelization effort, is continuously holding Bible Expositions for his non-Filipino audience. The International Evangelist also currently maintains an Internet webcast through Livestream.com, a blog and Twitter account. Bro. Eli Soriano holds a regular Bible Exposition for his Filipino constituents every Tuesday at 7:00 to 11:00 p.m. (Philippine time). Webcast link can be found by clicking this link.

programs.title: ASOP Music Festival
programs.description:
An alternative to blaring pop songs from your weekend staple of entertainment shows is UNTV’s A Song of Praise Music Festival. Launched as an annual song writing competition, ASOP encourages songwriters to bring glory to God through original music.

 

ASOP calls on both amateur and professional song writers to join the competition and get the chance to have their works interpreted by some of the most sought after pop artists of the Philippine music industry and critically evaluated by highly acclaimed composers and music connoisseurs.

programs.title: Ito ang Balita
programs.description: Ito ang Balita is a late afternoon newscast of UNTV that covers the latest breaking news and information on top stories around the country and abroad. Ito Ang Balita upholds the highest ideals of journalistic practice and ethics by avoiding sensationalism and adhering to objective and impartial news reporting.

programs.title: Bread n’ Butter
programs.description: Business and leisure go hand in hand at Bread N’ Butter as the jolly trio of Arlene Razon, Kitt Meily and Rodel Flordeliz explore the country and abroad for amazing travel destinations and the business opportunities. Featured livelihood ventures range from small to medium enterprises in various industries such as food, wellness and other

programs.title: Easy Lang Yan!
programs.description: It is a 30-minute infotainment focusing on do-it-yourself projects and practical solutions to commonplace problems at home. The show also orients viewers with the programs and policies of government agencies by offering step-by-step guides in processing documents and applications.

programs.title: Get it Straight with Daniel Razon
programs.description: Get It Straight offers a platform for controversial personalities to discuss their side of the story regarding hot topics and latest issues in the country. The early morning program (with an early afternoon Producer's Cut version) stands out from other talk show programs with Daniel Razon at the helm throwing hard-hitting questions that keeps guests and viewers alike on the edge of their seats.

programs.title: Good Morning Kuya!
programs.description: Filipino households are now waking up to brighter mornings with Good Morning Kuya's heightened and unmatched public services, sensible exchanges of stories and opinions, and trustworthy news reports. It also pulls together segments that bring rich, relevant and interesting information aiming to inspire, empower and educate the viewers.

programs.title: Istorya
programs.description:
Istorya is 30-minute documentary that exposes the stark realities of the socio-political and economic conditions the country is facing today.

 

Istorya's stories on human interest are told through the contemporary lives of individuals; highlighting not only the extraordinary but also the provocative.

 

A UNTV News and Public Affairs production.

programs.title: Itanong mo kay Soriano
programs.description: Itanong mo kay Soriano (Ask Bro. Soriano) is a program being produced by the Members Church of God International (MCGI) that features the question and answer portion of the weekly Bible Expositions. Bro. Eli Soriano is the Presiding Minister to the MCGI and also the host of the award-winning Ang Dating Daan (The Old Path). Bro. Eli, as the resource speaker in Bible Expositions, gives intriguing answers to people's questions in their search for Truth. Questions are asked live to Bro. Eli who then answers their questions using the Bible as basis. To recall, Bro. Eli started hosting Bible Exposition in the early 1990s, a concept drawn by the International Evangelist's nephew, Daniel Razon, who happens to be the Vice-Presiding Minister to the MCGI. The symposium-like activity gained popular attention with the help of Bro. Eli's religious radio and television program, Ang Dating Daan (The Old Path).

programs.title: Klasrum – Ibang Klase To!
programs.description: Klasrum: Ibang Klase ‘To is a youth-oriented show that equips teens with information and skills they need to survive high school and puberty. To help unlock each child’s full potential the show covers academics, personality development and social responsibility.

programs.title: Kawan Ng Cordero
programs.description:
Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.- Proverbs 22:6

Kawan ng Cordero is the only bible-based kiddie show on television to date. KNC stirs the interest of young ones to fascinating facts about the world through a biblical perspective. It covers informative topics such as natural wonders; creative hobbies and news articles for kids.
programs.schedule:
Monday to Friday| 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm
Saturday | 8:00 am to 8:30 am
Sunday, 8:00 am to 8:30 am (Bible Stories)

programs.title: Make My Day
programs.description: Make My Day is an issues-based essay on TV hosted by noted economist, businessman and engineer, Mr. Larry Henares Jr. It covers a broad range of topics to maintain its stated purpose: to enlighten, inspire, educate, astound, delight, amuse, and imbue with a sense of wonder.
programs.schedule: Monday to Friday | 8:05 pm to 8:15 pm

programs.title: Manibela
programs.description: Manibela aims to be the ultimate guide for the people behind the wheels. Showcasing test-drives, car reviews, motorbikes and vehicles from buggies to SUV’s, it goes beyond the adrenaline rush as it tackles road safety measures and up-to-date info in laws and ordinances.

programs.title: Munting Pangarap
programs.description: Munting Pangarap, one of UNTV’s flagship public service shows, extending a hand to those in need – with the aim of changing their lives not just on a one-time basis, but on a long-term one. It aims to help the needy with their small wishes, whether in the form of a small business, medical assistance, and other meek requests of the heart.

programs.title: PolWatch
programs.description: Polwatch was conceived to continue UNTV's advocacy in enlightening the public about the murky and often confusing topics and issues relative to politics, governance and government, and public service.

programs.title: 911-UNTV
programs.description: Q.U.A.T. or the Quick Action Team, designed to give maximum emphasis on UNTV's Tulong Muna, Bago Balita advocacy, which provides assistance to people caught in the midst of disasters. It also aims to present useful information that people should know when faced with emergencies, tragedies and calamities.

programs.title: Rotary in Action
programs.description: Rotary in Action encourage the culture of volunteerism in people and inspire them to help the less fortunate through Rotary, a service-oriented organization, recognized the power of media to rally people to take action and address the medical, legal, and socio-economic concerns of individuals and their communities.

programs.title: Sports 37
programs.description: Sports 37 is a powerhouse of knowledge and adventure put together, bringing the world of sports right in front of your living room. Expect a full hour packed with exhilarating know-how’s of sports, from indoor to outdoor and from the simplest to the most extreme of its kind; back to back with a heap of healthy living guide right through its core.

programs.title: Spotlight
programs.description: SPOTLIGHT offers an intimate glimpse into the lives of influential personalities. The show's hosts, TV personality and realtor William Thio along with UNTV's home grown host and practicing lawyer Atty. Regie Tongol, get up close and personal with the shakers and movers of the society to learn from their inspirational stories. The show aims to present the human side of these powerful personalities and to get to know the real person behind the image.

programs.title: Cook Eat Right
programs.description: Cook Eat Right promotes healthy living by featuring nutritious and exciting recipes from top restaurants and establishments in the metropolitan area. The show also explores regional Philippine cuisine as it discovers outstanding culinary talents around the country.

programs.title: Doctors on TV
programs.description: Hosted by medical specialists, Doctors on TV offers an informative insight into human health and diseases. The program follows real life medical cases from diagnosis and treatment to eventual recovery.
programs.schedule:
Tuesday| 7:00 to 8:00 p.m.
Sunday | 7:00 to 8:00 a.m.

programs.title: Pulis @ Ur Serbis
programs.description:
Negative characterization of the police in media has stereotyped all law enforcers. This practice continue to breed a culture of public distrust towards the force.

 

Pulis @ Ur Serbis bridges the gap to create an environment of trust and security with our police force through featured stories of heroism and dedication by the men and women behind the Philippine National Police

programs.title: UNTV Cup
programs.description: UNTV Cup unites the three branches of government in the universal game of basketball to promote camaraderie and philanthropy. It is a 4-month basketball competition among public servants who battle each other in the hardcourt for a chance to win cash prizes for their chosen charitable institutions.

programs.title: Pondahan ni Kuya Daniel
programs.description: Pondahan ni Kuya Daniel is patterned after the propensity of rural folks in the Philippines to gather in local watering holes such as variety stores to catch up on neighborhood gossip and social issues. Set to mimic a “sari-sari” store, Pondahan ni Kuya Daniel is cast with lively and diverse characters who give their unique perspectives to hot topics and controversies.

programs.title: D X-Man
programs.schedule:
Monday to Friday | 12:30 am - 1:00 am
Saturday and Sunday | 12:30 am - 1:00 am

programs.title: Hataw Balita
programs.schedule: Monday to Friday | 9:30 am - 9:35 am, 10:30 am - 10:35 am, 3:00 pm - 3:05 pm

programs.title: Truth In Focus
programs.schedule: Monday to Friday | 2:45 pm - 3:00 pm, 3:05 pm - 4:00 pm

programs.title: A Day in the Life
programs.description: A Day in a Life follows the activities of a top personality for one full day and broadcasted in real time as it happens. Uncut and unfiltered, it captures intimate details of the subject's character rarely seen by the public.
